shortdesc.ph: Checks whether the current camera supports exposure adjustment.
Checks whether the current camera supports adjusting exposure.

ul.li: This method applies to Android and iOS only.
You must call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).
